attributes.action: Urgently advise the public of the cold-like symptoms of the Covid Delta variant.
attributes.additional_details: It’s imperative that the public are made aware of the Delta variant symptoms, because they could easily be mistaken for a common cold or the ‘flu.  Without that knowledge, Covid will be spread even more because the public don’t know they must isolate, and get tested to ensure it’s not Covid.
attributes.background: The fantastic research work that ZoeCovid, via Kings College London, has been doing since the pandemic began, is being ignored by Dr Jenny Harris and Dr Susan Hopkins from the HSA (formerly Public Health England).

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: 

Expand and publicise the list of Covid 19 symptoms for free PCR tests:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/597393
